00015 SubmitTransferCli::SubmitTransferCli() {
00016 
00017         specific.add_options()
00018                         ("blocking,b", "Blocking mode, wait until the operation completes.")
00019                         ("file,f", value<string>(&cfg_file), "Name of a configuration file.")
00020                         ("gparam,g", value<string>(), "Gridftp parameters.")
00021                         ("interval,i", value<int>(), "Interval between two poll operations in blocking mode.")
00022                         ("myproxysrv,m", value<string>(), "MyProxy server to use.")
00023                         ("password,p", value<string>(), "MyProxy password to send with the job")
00024                         ("id,I", value<string>(), "Delegation with ID as the delegation identifier.")
00025                         ("expire,e", value<long>(), "Expiration time of the delegation in minutes.")
00026                         ("overwrite,o", "Overwrite files.")
00027                         ("dest-token,t", value<string>(),  "The destination space token or its description (for SRM 2.2 transfers).")
00028                         ("source-token,S", value<string>(), "he source space token or its description (for SRM 2.2 transfers).")
00029                         ("compare-checksum,K", "Compare checksums between source and destination.")
00030                         ("copy-pin-lifetime", value<int>(), "pin lifetime of the copy of the file (seconds)")
00031                         ("lan-connection", "use LAN as ConnectionType (default = WAN)")
00032                         ("fail-nearline", "fail the transfer if the file is nearline")
00033                         ;
00034 
00035         cli_options.add(specific);
00036 }

00042 void SubmitTransferCli::initCli(int ac, char* av[]) {
00043         CliBase::initCli(ac, av);
00044 
00045         if (vm.count("id")) {
00046                 delegate = true;
00047         }
00048 
00049         CliManager* manager = CliManager::getInstance();
00050 
00051     // decide on delegation depending on server
00052         if (manager->isDelegationSupported()) {
00053                 if (!vm.count("password")) {
00054                 cout << "# Server supports delegation. Delegation will be used by default." << endl;
00055                 delegate = true;
00056                 } else {
00057                 cout << "# Server supports delegation, however a MyProxy pass phrase was given: will use MyProxy legacy mode." << endl;
00058                 delegate = false;
00059                 }
00060         }
00061 
00062     if (vm.count("password")) {
00063         password = vm["password"].as<string>();
00064     } else {
00065         if (!delegate) {
00066                 password = CliManager::getInstance()->getPassword();
00067         }
00068     }
00069 
00070     /*if (!cfg_file.empty()) {
00071         cfg_desc.add(cli_options);
00072 
00073         ifstream ifs(cfg_file.c_str());
00074         if (!ifs) {
00075             cout << "Can not open configuration file: " << cfg_file << endl;
00076             return 0;
00077         } else {
00078             store(parse_config_file(ifs, cfg_desc), vm);
00079             notify(vm);
00080         }
00081     }*/
00082 }
00083 
00084 bool SubmitTransferCli::performChecks() {
00085 
00086         CliManager* manager = CliManager::getInstance();
00087 
00088         // the job is not specified
00089         if ((getSource().empty() || getDestination().empty()) && !vm.count("file")) {
00090                 cout << "No transfer job is specified." << endl;
00091                 return false;
00092         }
00093 
00094         // the job is specified twice using cli and in the config file
00095         if ((!getSource().empty() || !getDestination().empty()) && vm.count("file")) {
00096                 cout << "You may not specify a transfer on the command line if the -f option is used." << endl;
00097                 return false;
00098         }
00099 
00100         if (vm.count("compare-checksum") && !manager->isChecksumSupported()) {
00101                 cout << "You have specified an optional checksum, but it is not supported by the server." << endl;
00102                 return false;
00103         }
00104 
00105     // in the case of the -I option, delegation is required
00106     if (delegate && !manager->isDelegationSupported()) {
00107         cout <<"The server you are contacting does not support credential delegation (it is running interface version ";
00108         cout << /*srv_iface_ver <<*/ "). Please use the MyProxy password legacy method for this server." << endl;
00109         return false;
00110     }
00111 
00112     // in the case of the -K option, checksum is required
00113     if (vm.count("compare-checksum") && !manager->isChecksumSupported()) {
00114         cout <<"The server you are contacting does not support checksum checking (it is running interface version ";
00115         cout << /*srv_iface_ve <<*/ "). Please omit checksums for this server." << endl;
00116         return false;
00117     }
00118 
00119         return true;
00120 }
00121 
00122 transfer__TransferParams* SubmitTransferCli::getParams(soap* soap) {
00123 
00124         CliManager* manager = CliManager::getInstance();
00125         transfer__TransferParams *jobParams = soap_new_transfer__TransferParams(soap, -1);
00126 
00127         if (vm.count("compare-checksum")) {
00128                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_CHECKSUM_METHOD);
00129                 jobParams->values.push_back("compare");
00130         }
00131 
00132         if (vm.count("overwrite")) {
00133                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_OVERWRITEFLAG);
00134                 jobParams->values.push_back("Y");
00135         }
00136 
00137         if (vm.count("lan-connection")) {
00138                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_LAN_CONNECTION);
00139                 jobParams->values.push_back("Y");
00140         }
00141 
00142         if (vm.count("fail-nearline")) {
00143                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_FAIL_NEARLINE);
00144                 jobParams->values.push_back("Y");
00145         }
00146 
00147         if (vm.count("gparam")) {
00148                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_GRIDFTP);
00149                 jobParams->values.push_back(vm["gparam"].as<string>());
00150         }
00151 
00152         if (vm.count("myproxysrv")) {
00153                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_MYPROXY);
00154                 jobParams->values.push_back(vm["myproxysrv"].as<string>());
00155         }
00156 
00157         if (vm.count("id")) {
00158                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_DELEGATIONID);
00159                 jobParams->values.push_back(vm["id"].as<string>());
00160         }
00161 
00162         if (vm.count("dest-token")) {
00163                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_SPACETOKEN);
00164                 jobParams->values.push_back(vm["dest-token"].as<string>());
00165         }
00166 
00167         if (vm.count("source-token")) {
00168                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_SPACETOKEN_SOURCE);
00169                 jobParams->values.push_back(vm["source-token"].as<string>());
00170         }
00171 
00172         if (vm.count("copy-pin-lifetime")) {
00173                 string value = boost::lexical_cast<string>(vm["copy-pin-lifetime"].as<int>());
00174                 jobParams->keys.push_back(manager->FTS3_PARAM_COPY_PIN_LIFETIME);
00175                 jobParams->values.push_back(value);
00176         }
00177 
00178         return jobParams;
00179 }
00180 
00181 string SubmitTransferCli::getPassword() {
00182         return password;
00183 }
